mapper.update: update member_tm_member_card set no = #{no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cover = #{cover,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price = #{price,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, expires = #{expires,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ext1 = #{ext1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ext2 = #{ext2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, extention = #{extention,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
